DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluate impact ER/LA opioid REMS program incidence Emergency Department visit hospitalization overdose/poisoning death among patient prescribe ER/LA opioid analgesic .
DOC.brief_title: ER/LA Opioid Surveillance Emergency Department Visits Hospitalizations Overdose Poisoning
DOC.detailed_description: As part FDA-approved plan evaluate effect REMS program , REMS Program Companies ( RPC ) require submit FDA assessment report regular basis . The present study one several program evaluation component carry support Assessment 5 : Surveillance monitoring misuse , abuse , overdose , addiction , death intervention take . This study evaluate impact ER/LA opioid REMS program incidence ED visit hospitalization overdose/poisoning death among patient prescribe ER/LA opioid analgesic .
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least one dispense ER/LA opioid 01 July 2010 2 . At least six month continuous health plan eligibility prior first record dispensing opioid occur included REMS period 1 . Missing implausible value age 2 . Missing implausible value gender
